entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 10:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NE 25 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
